Configurando o VIM no Ubuntu

19 Sep 2010

`

sudo apt-get install vim-gtk exuberant-ctags ack ncurses-term

cd ~/

git clone git://github.com/akitaonrails/vimfiles.git .vim

echo "source ~/.vim/vimrc" > ~/.vimrc

cd .vim

git submodule update --init

`
